title: The Black Sheep Master Builder's Fake Marriage
description: He needs a wife...But he doesn't want one.Find out what happens when he places an ad for a wife and finds a woman he can't live without. Cash's grandfather left him the family home but he can't take possession of it unless he has a family of his own. He places an ad in the local classifieds and is shocked when Maggie shows up at his door.She was the one that got away.But not this time.He'll do everything he can to win her trust back and be the man she deserves. But will it be enough to make up for shattering her heart? Or will the two of them say goodbye just as fast as they said I do?Find out in this sweet romance, today.
author: Lucy McConnell
